name: Starlight Kingdoms
description:
A proof of concept for a summer/hobby game! Starlight would be a 3rd person adventure game that chronicles the adventure of a Knight trying to save his princess.

The world is made up of dungeons, monsters, traps, and friendly NPCs who help you on your way!

Note: What is presented in the download is the PROOF OF CONCEPT, and not anywhere near a completed project. The dungeon demo is currently under development and should be uploaded sometime in the next few months.
